body:
# Accident Investigation Report 6/2012

  
MAIB Report on the investigation of the electrical blackout and subsequent grounding of the feeder container vessel Clonlee on the River Tyne, England on 16 March 2011. Report No 6/2012. Published 28 March 2012.
